translation.en: if you have a clear view of the sky, which I did.
translation.ja: 信号が必ず届くはずなのに

translation.en: Only reason why it wouldn't work is if our satellites got knocked out of commission.
translation.ja: 使用できないのは 衛星が故障した時だけ

translation.en: Our satellites.
You think something happened to our satellites. The ones in space.
translation.ja: 宇宙にいる衛星に 何かが起こったと？

translation.en: Satellites are networked to computers down here.
translation.ja: 地上のコンピューターと つながってる

translation.en: So you think that the hackers or whatever knocked out our satellites?
translation.ja: ハッカーか何かに 壊されたと言うの？

translation.en: Don't you think you're maybe getting a little carried away? I mean, maybe you just didn't use the phone right.
translation.ja: 大げさすぎない？ 使い方を間違ったのよ

translation.en: I saw a plane nosedive out of the sky into the ocean.
translation.ja: 飛行機が海に 急降下するのを見た

translation.en: And it wasn't the first.
I no longer think that this is just a couple of teenagers in the Philippines.
translation.ja: 若者のいたずらとは もはや思えない

translation.en: What the fuck?
What the fuck?
Where are my kids?
Mommy.
Where's Dad?
He'll be back soon.
Why are you wet?
I should have covered my ears sooner.
Now my head feels weird.
That's probably normal. It was really loud.
translation.ja: 仕方ないわ 大きな音だったし

translation.en: Was it like a, um, like a- a plane breaking the sound barrier?
translation.ja: 飛行機が超音速で 飛んだ時の音かな？

translation.en: Or whatever that-- a sonic boom. Was, was that a sonic boom?
translation.ja: それか…　何だっけ… ソニックブーム？

translation.en: Planes don't usually break the sound barrier.
translation.ja: 飛行機は音速を超えない

translation.en: The Concorde doesn't fly anymore.
translation.ja: コンコルドは飛んでない

translation.en: Maybe it was a plane that we don't know about.
translation.ja: 新種の飛行機なのかも

translation.en: Archie, why don't you go get changed.
translation.ja: アーチー 着替えなさい

translation.en: Rose, maybe you should too.
That's a good idea.
Why don't you go cuddle up in Mommy's bed and read that book Dad got you.
translation.ja: ママのベッドで 本でも読んでて

translation.en: We're, um, we're going to be okay, right?
Yeah.
Since you're the one with the crystal ball, what was that?
translation.ja: あなたは予言者でしょ 今の何？

translation.en: Was that a bomb? A missile?
Could have been a power plant explosion.
We don't know anything for certain yet.
You seemed pretty certain a minute ago with your fucking haunting soliloquy.
translation.ja: さっきの話では 確信した口ぶりだった

translation.en: Nothing's changed.
Nothing's changed?
Everything has changed.
And we're sitting here like… like I don't know what.
translation.ja: なのに ただ座ってるだけ

translation.en: Is- Is this what sitting ducks are? Ducks sitting and waiting to be shot?
translation.ja: 無防備ってこと？ ただ攻撃を待つ？

translation.en: I meant nothing has changed in terms of what we do.
translation.ja: すべきことは同じって意味だ

translation.en: We wait for Clay to come back and we see what he's learned.
translation.ja: クレイが戻るのを待とう

translation.en: Should I drive to town and look for him?
translation.ja: 車で捜しに行こうかな

translation.en: We should fill the bathtubs full of water.
Is there enough batteries, and Tylenol, and food, and the generator,
translation.ja: 電池や鎮痛剤や食料や 発電機はある？

translation.en: and one of those hand crank radios, and a straw that makes it safe to drink dirty water.
translation.ja: 防災ラジオと 泥水を 飲料水に変えるストローも

translation.en: I think we shouldn't do anything until Clay comes back.
What if he's not coming back?
Okay, my dad is right.
translation.ja: ねえ 父が正しいわ

translation.en: We're safe here. We should just sit tight.
How do you know that we're safe when you don't know what the fuck is happening to us?
translation.ja: 情報がないのに確信できる？

translation.en: Maybe it was like, what was that? Ten Mile Island?
translation.ja: あれよ　テンマイル島？

translation.en: There are power plants here, aren't there?
translation.ja: 原子力発電所の事故よ

translation.en: - Three Mile Island. - Why are you obsessed with power plants?
translation.ja: スリーマイル島 また発電所の話？

translation.en: Hey, you're right. We shouldn't speculate.
translation.ja: そうだ　推測はよそう

translation.en: Stop saying that!
I just want you to fucking tell me what you're thinking.
translation.ja: 考えてることを正直に話して

translation.en: There's the blackout and then you see the planes crashing and…
translation.ja: 停電が起こって 次は飛行機が墜落…

translation.en: What?
What? She's an adult.
You cannot protect her, just like you cannot protect me right now.
translation.ja: 隠し事しても守れないわ

translation.en: The satellite phone not working and then that noise, and then what?
translation.ja: 衛星電話が使えず さっきの騒音　次は何？

translation.en: What happens next in that sequence?
Everything I know I have told you.
I don't believe you.
I haven't believed you since you walked through that front door.
translation.ja: 最初からずっと 信用していない

translation.en: Golly. I wonder what it is about us that makes you so mistrustful.
translation.ja: なぜそこまで 私たちに不信感を抱くの？

translation.en: Ruth…
You always think you know what you're talking about, don't you?
translation.ja: 人を見下した態度は やめて

translation.en: Well, ain't that the pot calling the kettle black?
Ruth.
He knew.
At the market in town yesterday,
there was a guy in the parking lot.
He bought cases of water and canned goods.
translation.ja: 水や缶詰を何ケースも 買ってた

translation.en: He knew this was going to happen.
Bearded guy?
Probably wearing an old Cowboys hat.
That's Danny. He's the contractor I was telling you about.
translation.ja: ダニーだ　昨日 話した職人

translation.en: The one who worked on the house.
I wouldn't read into it. He's a self- proclaimed survivalist.
translation.ja: 気にしなくていい 彼は自称 生存主義者だ

translation.en: That shopping list was probably a typical weekend for him.
translation.ja: いつもの買い出しだよ

translation.en: Jesus Christ.
I'm here. I'm okay, are you okay? Where are the kids?
translation.ja: 戻ったよ　大丈夫？ 子供たちは？

translation.en: - Everyone's here, everyone's okay. - Okay.
translation.ja: 全員 家にいる　安全だ

translation.en: What happened? Did you get to town?
I didn't get far. And then I heard that noise.
translation.ja: 遠くに行けなかった あの騒音もあったし

translation.en: What do you mean? Where have you been? What were you doing? I was going crazy.
translation.ja: じゃあどこに行ってたの？ 心配したのよ

translation.en: I don't know, I- I just started to drive,
translation.ja: よく分からないが 運転してると⸺

translation.en: and then I heard that noise, and I came right back.
translation.ja: あの騒音がしたから すぐに戻ってきた

translation.en: So you didn't see anyone that might help us figure out what's happening here.
translation.ja: じゃあ 誰にも会っていない？

translation.en: No, I did not see anyone.
But I did see something. I saw--
It was this huge, um, drone.
translation.ja: 巨大なドローンだった

translation.en: You know, flying in the middle of nowhere, dropping off thousands of these.
translation.ja: これを何千枚も落としてた

translation.en: I have no idea what it says.
Death to America.
What?
Death to America.
I mean, I don't know what the rest of this means,
translation.ja: 残りは分からないけど

translation.en: but this part, it definitely means Death to America.
translation.ja: こっちはそういう意味

translation.en: I remember from a game I was playing.
Nothing about this makes sense.
If they were attacking us, why would they advertise it like this?
translation.ja: 攻撃ならなぜ告知する？

translation.en: It's not even in English. What's the point of dropping these things here?
translation.ja: 英語でもないし 意味がない

translation.en: I'm pretty sure I make that first right, then it's a straight shot to the expressway?
translation.ja: 角を右に曲がって 真っすぐ行けば高速？

translation.en: With what we know, the city would be the worst place for you to go.
translation.ja: 市内には戻らない方がいい

translation.en: We're not going to the city. We're going to my sister's in Jersey.
translation.ja: ニュージャージーに行く 姉がいるの

translation.en: But to get to New Jersey from here, you have to drive through the city.
translation.ja: 市内を通過しなければ 行けない

translation.en: But to be clear, I make a right, follow signs to the Expressway.
translation.ja: 右に曲がって 標識に従えばいいね？

translation.en: Yes, exactly like how you got here. But listen to me, please.
translation.ja: そうだけど 聞いてくれ

translation.en: This is dangerous what you're doing, for you and your family.
Dad.
Let them go.
I really appreciate you taking care of us, I do.
translation.ja: お世話になったわ　感謝する

translation.en: We have to do what's right for our family.
translation.ja: でも家族のためだから

translation.en: This is in everyone's best interest.
This is for the better.
For who?
For us.
I don't want to have to agree with that woman, but she was right.
translation.ja: 認めたくないけど 彼女の言うとおり

translation.en: And you really should've told me what you saw.
translation.ja: 全部話してほしかった

translation.en: Hey, I know what you're thinking, but I'm certain your mother's plane wouldn't be flying over here.
translation.ja: 言い分は分かるが 母さんの飛行機は無事さ

translation.en: It wasn't the same airline.
Is she gone?
Oh, come on now. Why are you even going there?
I just told you, it wasn't even the same airline.
translation.ja: 会社が違うと言っただろ？

translation.en: Yeah, but does it feel like she's gone?
translation.ja: でも そう思わない？

translation.en: Because it does to me.
If we hit traffic, at least we'll be able to talk to people,
translation.ja: 渋滞にぶつかれば 誰かと話ができる

translation.en: see if anyone has information about what's going on.
It's crazy we haven't seen anyone.
I'm sure we will see someone as soon as we hit the Expressway.
translation.ja: 高速に入れば いるさ

translation.en: Phones could work in New Jersey.
translation.ja: 姉の所なら電話が使える

translation.en: The truth is we don't know anything that's going on outside of Long Island.
translation.ja: 他では どういう状況なのかしら

translation.en: They could have internet, the phone lines could be okay.
translation.ja: ネットや携帯も使えたりして

translation.en: We'll look back on this one day and laugh, I guarantee you.
translation.ja: いつか笑える日が来るわ

translation.en: The vacation from Hell.
Things get funnier with time. Isn't that what they say?
I think they say it a little differently.
But, you know, I know what you mean.
Sirens.
I thought you were napping, honey.
I can't.
Why not?
Because of the sirens.
What is that?
You stay with the kids. I'm gonna go take a look.
You know what, you guys, sit-- Sit tight, okay?
See anyone?
There's nobody here.
They're all brand new.
What?
Oh, wow. Hey, someone's coming.
Yo!
Clay!
- Clay, get in the car! - Wait, shouldn't we wait and talk to them?
translation.ja: 車に戻って 何で？　話は？

translation.en: - Get in the fucking car right now! - All right, all right.
translation.ja: いいから！ 分かった

translation.en: What are you doing? Shouldn't we flag them down?
translation.ja: 何するんだ？ 話を聞かないの？

translation.en: - Maybe they know something. - There's no one in that car!
translation.ja: 何するんだ？ 話を聞かないの？ あれ無人車よ！

translation.en: Mom? Mom, on your left, there's a car! Go, go, go, go!
What if we went to a shelter?
Does the military have a bomb shelter or a base around here?
translation.ja: 近くに 軍の防空施設とかない？

translation.en: I mean, don't they have to have those things ready for…
…emergencies like these?
I don't know where they are.
Even if I did, you said all those cars came off the lot.
translation.ja: 知ってても 車が店から出てきてる

translation.en: If they did that to every dealership, the main roads are most likely clogged up.
translation.ja: 全車が出てきてるなら 道路は埋まってるだろう

translation.en: We stay here till we know more.
How much more do we need to know? We're probably in the middle of a war zone.
translation.ja: 情報？　ここは交戦地帯よ

translation.en: People we know are likely dead.
translation.ja: 多分 知り合いは 全員死んだ

translation.en: Ruth.
Just--
We just need to make a plan.
We can't sit here and do nothing. We need to go somewhere.
translation.ja: どこかに避難しないと

translation.en: He's right, Amanda. It's too dangerous.
We stay here tonight, and then in the morning, maybe--
translation.ja: 今晩はここに泊まって 明日の朝…

translation.en: - Maybe what? - Maybe-- I don't know.
translation.ja: 朝に何？ 分からない

translation.en: I was so close.
What are you doing?
Filling up the tub.
That's what they say to do for,
you know, water.
Do you vape?
Not really.
I mean, is that-- That's like, marijuana?
I mean, I know they got different kinds now, like fruit flavors or--
translation.ja: フルーツ味とか 色々あるようだけど

translation.en: Like marijuana.
Have you ever fucked one of your students?
I can't believe you just asked me that.
I mean, is that what I look like to you? I look like that kind of guy?
translation.ja: 僕がそんな男に見える？

translation.en: You look like the kind of guy to whom things come easy.
translation.ja: 何でも簡単に手に入れそう

translation.en: Especially women.
Well, I'll take that as a compliment, I guess. Hmm?
I always thought of myself as a sophisticated man.
translation.ja: 洗練された男だと自覚してた

translation.en: Someone who had seen the world for what it was.
translation.ja: 現実を見てきた男だと

translation.en: But I have never seen anything like this.
translation.ja: でもこんなのは初めてだ

translation.en: So now, I wonder if that thing I always thought about myself was a delusion.
translation.ja: 己の姿に 妄想を抱いていただけなのか

translation.en: I wouldn't be too hard on yourself. You dig deep enough, it's probably all a delusion.
translation.ja: 自分を責めないで きっとすべてが妄想なのよ

translation.en: I mean, take your line of work, for example.
Imaginary numbers,
moving around imaginary money, leading to imaginary success.
translation.ja: 想像上のお金の上で動き 想像上の成功につながる

translation.en: Personally, I think my business is a lot less complicated than all that.
translation.ja: 僕の仕事は それほど複雑ではない

translation.en: At its most basic, my work is and always has been about people.
translation.ja: 基本的に 人を中心にした 仕事なんだ

translation.en: - I'm real sorry for you then. - And why is that?
translation.ja: じゃあ 可哀想 どうして？

translation.en: Because people are terrible.
I mean, fuck. Look at the way I treated you.
translation.ja: 私もあなたに 酷い態度を取った

translation.en: And now we are enjoying a drink together.
translation.ja: でも今は一緒に飲んでる

translation.en: I am sorry, by the way.
For what I said, did, thought, it doesn't matter.
translation.ja: 私の発言も 態度も 考えも

translation.en: I was wrong and I'm sorry.
Some of my smartest clients have lost a lot of money
translation.ja: 頭のいい顧客でも 多額の金を失う

translation.en: because they based their choices on preconceived beliefs instead of truth.
translation.ja: 真実ではなく 先入観に 基づいて選択するからだ

translation.en: Seeing the difference is one of the hardest things a person can do.
translation.ja: 先入観と認識するのは難しい

translation.en: When they don't and you do, gotta be maddening.
translation.ja: 外から見てると ムカつきそう

translation.en: Depending on the person,
I might take a little satisfaction in watching the market punish them.
translation.ja: 市場に罰されるのを見た時 少し満足する

translation.en: The scary ones, though, are the ones who don't learn.
translation.ja: 学ばない人が一番怖い

translation.en: Even after they lose lots, and I mean lots, of money.
translation.ja: かなりの金を損失してもだ

translation.en: Nothing frightens me more than a person unwilling to learn,
translation.ja: 身銭を切って学ばない人は

translation.en: even at their own expense.
That's a darkness I will never understand.
translation.ja: その闇は理解できない

translation.en: The quiet is so noisy.
It's one of the first things I noticed when we started spending nights here.
translation.ja: ここで過ごし始めて気付いた

translation.en: Found it hard to sleep.
Not like at home, where you hear everything.
Sirens, traffic, people.
I miss that.
Which, the sirens or the people?
I am starting to like you,
translation.ja: あなたを好きになってきた

translation.en: and that is a bold statement coming from me because…
translation.ja: 私にしたら大胆な発言よ

translation.en: I can't remember the last time I liked anybody.
I have to say, I found you very prickly at the outset,
translation.ja: 最初は とげとげしかったけど⸺

translation.en: but you've grown on me.
Why did you really come here?
And don't tell me it's because of your knee.
translation.ja: 膝のせいにしないでね

translation.en: That wasn't a lie. I did have a knee surgery.
translation.ja: 嘘じゃない　手術をした

translation.en: Twisted it up pretty bad playing ball down at the Y.
translation.ja: 野球をしてる時に 捻(ひね)ったんだ

translation.en: But it's not why you came here.
Why I came here involves something that happened to me a few years back.
translation.ja: ここに来た理由は 数年前の出来事が絡んでる

translation.en: One of my clients invited me and my wife to a private event.
translation.ja: ある顧客から イベントに招待された

translation.en: My client, he…
Well.
I won't say his name, but you'd recognize it though.
translation.ja: 名前は言わないけど 知ってると思う

translation.en: - Is he a celebrity? - Oh, no. Nothing like that.
translation.ja: 有名人？ いや 違う

translation.en: But in the business world, he's one of the biggest out there.
translation.ja: でもビジネスの世界では 大物だ

translation.en: He deals mostly in defense contracting.
translation.ja: 防衛関連の事業に 携わっている

translation.en: I'm talking hush- hush, top- secret money from the Pentagon.
translation.ja: 国防省と極秘で商売する人だ

translation.en: Perhaps the most powerful person I've ever had a meal with.
Anyway, we're at this soiree at his house.
translation.ja: とにかく 彼の自宅での 夜会だった

translation.en: It's getting late. My wife, she wants to go.
translation.ja: 夜も更け 妻は帰りたがってたが

translation.en: But he and I are just having a blast, and he doesn't want the night to end.
translation.ja: 彼と僕は楽しくて 夜が終わってほしくない

translation.en: After a few more glares,
my wife agrees to take a cab and I'll come home after.
translation.ja: 妻はタクシーで 先に帰ることになった

translation.en: Mm, I bet she was real happy about that.
So, we're having a few more drinks, getting really sauced, and at one point,
translation.ja: 僕たちは飲み続け かなり酔っ払い 最後には⸺

translation.en: I don't think he could stand and I was pretty wobbly, myself.
translation.ja: 彼は立ち上がれず 僕は千鳥足だった

translation.en: I wouldn't know anything about that, sir.
So he takes me to his study.
translation.ja: で 彼の書斎に行って

translation.en: Smoke a few cigars
and we're sort of flying high, laughing at almost everything.
translation.ja: つまらないことに 大爆笑してた

translation.en: Eventually he starts in on how much he likes me,
and how he wishes he could invite me on this trip he's about to go on.
translation.ja: 今度の旅行に連れて 行きたかったと言う

translation.en: What kind of trip? Where is he going?
translation.ja: どんな旅行？　どこに？

translation.en: That's exactly what I asked.
Then he…
turns to me,
serious face.
And he says…
Oh, you know,
just my annual meeting with the rest of the evil cabal that runs the world.
translation.ja: “世界を操る悪の陰謀団との 毎年恒例の会議だ”

translation.en: He was the kind of guy that was always known for jokes like that.
translation.ja: そういう冗談を言う男だった

translation.en: Again, if I told you his name, you would understand.
translation.ja: 名前を言えば納得するよ

translation.en: Well, I just have to take your word for it.
And now if you'll excuse me, I'm gonna top off my wine.
translation.ja: 話の途中で悪いけど お代わりを…

translation.en: Then yesterday, before the symphony, my friend calls me up.
translation.ja: で 昨日の演奏会の前に 彼から電話があった

translation.en: No scheduled appointment, like he usually does.
Just calls me out of the blue
and wants me to move around some of his money.
And we're talking some big numbers, even for him.
translation.ja: 彼にとっても大金だった

translation.en: And as we're getting off the phone, I asked if he wanted to grab a drink.
translation.ja: 電話を切る前に また飲まないかと誘うと

translation.en: He tells me he's going away for a while.
translation.ja: しばらく留守にすると言う

translation.en: And I joke back to him,
Oh, yeah? You hanging with your evil cabal this weekend?
translation.ja: “悪の陰謀団と 集まるのか？”

translation.en: I thought that was only during the winter solstice.
translation.ja: “冬至でもないのに”と 言うと⸺

translation.en: But he doesn't laugh.
And he always laughs, even with bad jokes.
translation.ja: 普段は何にでも笑うのに

translation.en: All he said was…
Take care of yourself.
Almost as if he felt sorry for me.
translation.ja: 僕を哀れむかのように

translation.en: Ever since, I haven't been able to get it out of my head.
translation.ja: そのことが忘れられない

translation.en: Are you saying that--
Are you thinking that your friend is somehow behind what's happening here?
translation.ja: この状況に 友達が絡んでいると？

translation.en: No, nothing like that.
A conspiracy theory about a shadowy group of people running the world
translation.ja: 悪の一味が世界を 支配するという陰謀説は⸺

translation.en: is far too lazy of an explanation.
Especially when the truth is much scarier.
translation.ja: 真実は より恐ろしい

translation.en: What is the truth?
No one is in control.
No one is pulling the strings.
Sure, there are those like my friend
who might have the right kind of access to the right kind of information.
translation.ja: 情報にアクセスできる 人間はいる

translation.en: But when events like this happen in the world,
translation.ja: だが世界で こんなことが起きると

translation.en: the best, even the most powerful people can hope for
translation.ja: 権力者でさえ 警告を受けるのが⸺

translation.en: is a heads up.
Sorry, this…
Guess this story's kind of a buzzkill.
Changed my mind. I don't think I like you anymore.
translation.ja: やっぱりあなたが嫌い

translation.en: Come on.
Let's go.
Where are we going?
I'm gonna win you over again.
I see you, Rose.
What do you want?
I'm never going to find out what happens to Ross and Rachel, am I?
translation.ja: 「フレンズ」の結末を 知れないのね

translation.en: You're still on this shit?
Who gives a fuck?
Well, I do. Obviously.
Why do you care so much about that show anyway?
translation.ja: あの番組のどこがいい？

translation.en: They make me happy.
I really need that right now. Don't you?
If there's any hope left in this fucked up world,
translation.ja: まだ望みがあるのなら⸺

translation.en: I wanna at least find out how things turn out for them.
I care about them.
Maybe you shouldn't.
I'm just saying.
You're probably right, the way things are going
translation.ja: お前の言うとおり この状況では⸺

translation.en: you're not gonna see that show ever again.
So if I were you, I'd find something else to care about.
translation.ja: だから他のものを大切にしろ

translation.en: It's weird, we're not hearing any cicadas tonight.
translation.ja: 変ね セミの鳴き声がしない

translation.en: I got lost today.
When I went out this morning.
What do you mean you got lost?
I thought I knew where I was going
translation.ja: 行き先は頭にあったが

translation.en: but then there were all these streets that didn't have any signs anywhere.
translation.ja: 道路には看板が全くなくて

translation.en: So I just drove around.
Then I drove around some more.
And then, you know, I turn around, and then I got just completely lost,
translation.ja: Ｕターンしたら 完全に迷ってしまった

translation.en: and I have no idea how I found my way back here, to be honest.
translation.ja: ここに戻れたのが奇跡だ

translation.en: But I did see someone.
A woman.
On the road.
She waved me down and, um,
she was speaking Spanish.
translation.ja: スペイン語を話してた

translation.en: She was just standing there
translation.ja: 突然 立ってたんだ

translation.en: by the side of the road in the middle of nowhere.
And I…
I left her.
She needed help.
And I left her.
Well, is there anything else that you're keeping from us?
Since you're opening up, that is.
Well, we didn't tell you before that we saw an oil tanker ground.
translation.ja: オイルタンカーのことを 話していない

translation.en: Like, right up on the beach.
An oil tanker?
Yeah, it's like a really big boat.
translation.ja: ああ 大きな船だった

translation.en: You know, it's red. I mean, well, I don't think that they're all red,
translation.ja: 赤い船　全部が赤かどうかは 知らないけど⸺

translation.en: but this one was, and it came right up on the beach.
translation.ja: とにかくタンカーが 浜に突っ込んだ

translation.en: Why didn't you tell us?
Well, I think at the time we were both scared, you know?
translation.ja: あの時は 怖かったからだと思う

translation.en: About what it could mean.
Well, what could it mean?
Well, if we were being attacked,
translation.ja: 攻撃されたってことさ

translation.en: which I know sounds weird to say, but oil is something
translation.ja: 変に聞こえるだろうけど 石油は

translation.en: that you would want a lot of if, you know, we're going to defend ourselves.
translation.ja: 自国を守るには大量に必要だ

translation.en: I cannot believe we're having this conversation.
I really think we're gonna be all right.
You know, I mean, in the end, I really do.
translation.ja: きっと 最後にはね

translation.en: I mean, even if it is like, an invasion.
An invasion?
Well, or an occupation?
Okay, dude, you know what? I know that you mean well,
translation.ja: よかれと思って 言ってるんだろうけど

translation.en: but your word choices are, like, freaking me the fuck out.
translation.ja: 恐ろしい言葉を使わないで

translation.en: What was that?
Those are… flamingos.
translation.ja: あれ… フラミンゴよ

translation.en: Those are flamingos?
Those are flamingos.
Why?
Wow, this is an impressive collection.
translation.ja: すごい　見事なコレクション

translation.en: You like jazz?
You want to listen to jazz?
Sure, why not?
Because I thought we were going to have some fun.
translation.ja: 楽しむんだと思ってた

translation.en: Let's have something we could dance to.
translation.ja: 何か踊れる曲がいいわ

translation.en: You can dance to jazz.
In fact, when I bought my first record, that was--
translation.ja: 初めて買ったレコードは…

translation.en: Oh, please not another one of your stories.
translation.ja: あなたの話はもういい

translation.en: They end up leaving me severely disturbed. Wait. What are these records?
translation.ja: 不安にさせられるから これは何？

translation.en: Don't look over there. Those are my daughter's records.
She had a DJ phase in college.
translation.ja: 大学時代 娘はＤＪにハマってた

translation.en: Now this looks like something a lady can properly dance to.
Oh, come on. That's not what I brought you in here for.
translation.ja: ダメだよ そんなの聴かせたくない

translation.en: You said you wanted to win me over.
This is how.
We're drunk.
We are…
Ah, we're married. I'm married. You have a wife.
translation.ja: 結婚してる あなたには妻がいる

translation.en: I do, yes.
I love her dearly.
I really…
I really miss her.
You'll see her again.
No.
No, I don't think I will.
And Ruth.
What if something happened to her too? I don't think I could live with myself.
translation.ja: 何かあったら 僕は生きていけない

translation.en: Nothing is going to happen to Ruth. I promise.
translation.ja: 何も起こらないわ　約束する

translation.en: We're in this together with you till things get back to normal.
translation.ja: 元に戻るまで 一緒に頑張りましょう

translation.en: Amanda, we gotta start seeing this for what it is.
translation.ja: 現実を受け止めるんだ

translation.en: There is no going back to normal.
Don't say that. We have to--
Is he okay?
He's a little warm, but I think he'll be fine.
translation.ja: 熱が少しあるけど大丈夫

translation.en: What are you still doing up?
I keep thinking about this one West Wing episode.
translation.ja: 「ザ･ホワイトハウス」の １話を思い出してた

translation.en: There's this story, someone tells the president--
translation.ja: その話では 誰かが大統領に…

translation.en: You watched The West Wing?
Only the Aaron Sorkin seasons.
Anyway, the story was about a man who lived by the river.
translation.ja: とにかく 川の近くに住む男の話

translation.en: And he hears on the radio that the river is going to flood the town
translation.ja: 洪水になるから避難しろって

translation.en: and everyone should leave.
But the man doesn't go anywhere because he prays every day.
translation.ja: でも彼はお祈りするばかりで どこにも行かない

translation.en: He knows that God loves him and will save him.
translation.ja: 神様が救ってくれると 信じてる

translation.en: But then the flood actually happens.
translation.ja: でも洪水は 本当に起こって⸺

translation.en: And this guy in a rowboat sees the man and says, Hey, come on, I can save you.
translation.ja: ボートに乗ってる男に “助けてやる”と言われるの

translation.en: But the man tells him he isn't going anywhere.
Then the helicopter comes flying by, and the pilot lowers the ladder,
translation.ja: 今度はヘリコプターが来て 梯子(はしご)を下ろすけど⸺

translation.en: but the man tells him he isn't going anywhere.
After that, the man drowns in the flood.
And so he goes up to heaven and he's really angry at God,
translation.ja: 天国に行き 神様に怒るの

translation.en: and he tells him, I prayed to you every day.
translation.ja: “毎日祈り 愛されてると思ってた”

translation.en: I thought you loved me. Why didn't you save me?
translation.ja: “毎日祈り 愛されてると思ってた” “なぜ放置した？”

translation.en: And God says,
I sent you a radio report,
a rowboat and a helicopter.
translation.ja: “舟もヘリコプターも 送った”

translation.en: What more do you want?
What's this about, Rose?
I think I'm done waiting.
- Dad? - Hmm?
Will you sleep in the bed with me?
Not sure.
The bed's not big, and I don't mind sleeping on the floor.
translation.ja: 狭いし パパは床でいいよ

translation.en: - It's sometimes good for my back. - I'm scared.
translation.ja: 腰にもいい 怖いの

translation.en: It's just us now, isn't it?
What do you mean by that?
What I mean is,
if the shit goes down, do you trust these people that are in our house?
translation.ja: 何かあったら あの人たちを 信頼できる？

translation.en: We already know the wife has no chill.
That boy was sneaking pictures of me by the pool.
translation.ja: 息子は私を盗撮してるし

translation.en: That little girl keeps staring into the woods like Donnie Darko,
translation.ja: 娘は森をずっと見つめてる

translation.en: and I'm pretty sure the husband wants to fuck me.
translation.ja: 旦那は私とヤりたがってる

translation.en: How do you know that?
He's not actually going to do anything, he's not that guy.
translation.ja: 実際には手を出さない

translation.en: But did he want to? Abso- fucking- lutely.
translation.ja: けど完全にヤりたがってる

translation.en: My point remains, I don't trust them.
translation.ja: 信頼できないって意味

translation.en: I'm not gonna let anything happen to you, if that's what you're asking.
translation.ja: 父さんが守る それを聞きたいのか？

translation.en: I'm asking for you to remember that if the world falls apart,
translation.ja: 覚えておいて 世界が崩壊したら⸺

translation.en: trust should not be doled out easily to anyone,
translation.ja: 人を簡単に信頼してはダメ

translation.en: especially white people.
Even mom would agree with me on that.
I got it.
Do you?
Because we're sleeping in the basement of our own house for the second night in a row.
translation.ja: 自宅なのに２日連続で 地下で寝てる

translation.en: Just what exactly was the point of letting them back into the house?
translation.ja: なぜ また受け入れたの？

translation.en: It was the right thing to do.
And that right there. That's what's going to fuck us in the end.
translation.ja: それよ　最後に 私たちを滅ぼすのは

translation.en: Drink up.
Where's Rosie?
I don't know. She got up before us.
translation.ja: さあ　先に起きたようだ

translation.en: I'm gonna have a look around. You should get up.
translation.ja: 捜してくる　君も起きろ

translation.en: How are you feeling, baby?
Come on.
I know you're sleepy but I need you to get up so I can get a look at you and take your temperature.
translation.ja: 眠いでしょうけど 体温を測るから起きて

translation.en: You were pretty warm last night.
Well, you're not so warm now.
Yay.
Does your throat hurt?
- No. - Good.
What is that? Blood, is that blood?
translation.ja: 何それ？　血？　血なの？

translation.en: What are you--
What are you--
What are you fucking doing?
What the fuck? Are those your teeth?
Archie.
Stop doing that. Clay!
translation.ja: 触らないで クレイ

translation.en: My teeth.
Clay!
What's happening to me?
Clay!
Is everything okay?
- Something's wrong with Archie. - What is it? What the fuck?
translation.ja: アーチーが 何？　何だこれ！

translation.en: - That's exactly what I said. - My teeth just, they felt weird.
translation.ja: でしょ？ 歯が変な感じで⸺

translation.en: And I touched them, and they just they fell out.
He was a little warm last night but this, I don't know.
translation.ja: 夜 微熱があったけど 何なの

translation.en: Okay, all right. Well you-- you're okay.
translation.ja: いいか？　その… 大丈夫だ

translation.en: I don't feel okay.
How are you feeling?
translation.ja: パート５ グランドフィナーレ 気分は？

translation.en: Besides your teeth falling out, I mean.
What kind of question is that? He's obviously sick.
I'm not sick, Mom. My teeth just fell out.
translation.ja: 病気じゃない 歯が抜けただけ

translation.en: Maybe it was the bug that bit me. I don't know.
What bug?
A bug bit me yesterday in the woods.
translation.ja: 昨日 森の中で刺された

translation.en: That must be it, then.
Probably just a tick, Lyme disease. I've seen stranger symptoms.
translation.ja: ダニかライム病 変な症状を見たことがある

translation.en: Stranger than this?
He needs to go to the emergency room. We need to go to the hospital.
translation.ja: 救急病院に連れていかないと

translation.en: We can't. The expressway's the only way out of town.
translation.ja: 無理だ　高速を通れない

translation.en: Besides, if the roads are jammed, no one would be there to help us anyway.
translation.ja: きっと病院にも人はいない

translation.en: Well, we have to do something. Archie needs to see a doctor.
translation.ja: どうにかして 診てもらわないと

translation.en: I can't believe this is happening. I can't believe this is happening.
translation.ja: こんなことが起こるなんて 信じられない

translation.en: We'll go to my contractor's house. He's not that far from here.
translation.ja: 職人の家に行こう さほど遠くない

translation.en: You said you saw him stocking up on supplies?
translation.ja: 彼が買いだめしてるのを 見たね？

translation.en: If I know Danny, he's prepared for anything. He might have something useful.
translation.ja: ダニーは 抗生物質や薬など持ってる

translation.en: Antibiotics, medicine.
translation.ja: 役立つものがあるかも

translation.en: Danny'll know what to do.
Hey.
I promise you, I'll get your son some help.
translation.ja: 約束する　助けを必ず得る

translation.en: Where's Rose?
I couldn't find her.
What? What does that mean?
I looked all over the house. She's not here.
translation.ja: 家中を捜したがいない

translation.en: - She's not in the backyard. - I'll look downstairs.
translation.ja: 裏庭にも 地下を見よう 探検してるんだ

translation.en: She's probably exploring the house.
translation.ja: 地下を見よう 探検してるんだ

translation.en: She might be playing outside. I'll look out for her.
translation.ja: 外で遊んでるか見てくる

translation.en: I looked there but feel free to check again.
I don't understand. Where is she?
- She has to be here somewhere. - No, she's not!
translation.ja: どこかにいるはず いない！　全部捜したが どこにも見つからない

translation.en: I'm telling you, I have looked everywhere and she's not here.
translation.ja: いない！　全部捜したが どこにも見つからない

translation.en: - Well, she should be in the garage. - I already looked in the garage.
translation.ja: ガレージにいるかも もう捜した

translation.en: Okay. Where the fuck haven't you looked, Clay?
She's not down there.
Okay, this is insane. Where is she?
translation.ja: おかしい　どこなの？

translation.en: She wasn't outside, but I think she may have taken one of the bikes from the garage.
translation.ja: 外にもいないけど 自転車がなくなってる

translation.en: Took one of the bikes? Where would she go?
Do you have any idea where your sister might be, bud?
I don't know. Um, we were out by the shed yesterday, so--
translation.ja: さあ 昨日 小屋に行ったけど

translation.en: The shed? What shed?
The-- the shed.
Um, she-- she saw some deer and she wanted to go look for them.
translation.ja: 鹿を見たから探したいって だから あそこかも

translation.en: - So maybe there. I don't know. - Okay, I'm going.
translation.ja: 鹿を見たから探したいって だから あそこかも 行くわ

translation.en: - - Archie, you all right?
translation.ja: アーチー　大丈夫か？

translation.en: - - Are you all right--
- He needs help now. - Yeah, okay.
- Okay, I got you. - I'm coming with you.
translation.ja: 掴(つか)まるんだ 私も行く

translation.en: No, it's not safe.
Stay here with Amanda. Find Rose.
translation.ja: アマンダとローズを捜せ

translation.en: No. What? You can't leave me here by myself.
- It'll be okay. - Dad, we talked about this.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ 昨晩 話した １人にしないで

translation.en: You cannot leave me here by myself.
translation.ja: 昨晩 話した １人にしないで

translation.en: - He's sick, don't you see that? - Dad, you will never come back.
translation.ja: 彼は病気だ 戻ってこられない

translation.en: Don't you see that something is happening? It is happening right now.
translation.ja: 何かが起こってるの 分からない？

translation.en: Whatever it is, it's happening to Archie, it's happening to all of us.
translation.ja: 皆にも同じことが起こってる

translation.en: You can't leave. The world could be ending out there.
translation.ja: 行かないで この世の終わりかも

translation.en: That's why I want you here.
Take out your phone.
Come on, take it out.
Set a timer, one hour.
I'll be back.
It won't work.
It won't work out.
It will, there's no choice.
Look, I'll be back for you before this goes off.
translation.ja: これが鳴る前に帰ってくる

translation.en: One hour. That's what you get. You've promised.
Rose? Rose!
Rosie! Rose!
This is a nightmare.
This is a goddamn nightmare.
Where would Rose have gone? Why would she leave?
translation.ja: ローズはどこ？ なぜ消えたの

translation.en: She said she was done waiting. What did she mean?
translation.ja: 待てないと言ってたのは どういう意味？

translation.en: What if we just went back to the house and we waited for my dad to get back?
translation.ja: 家に戻って パパたちを待たない？

translation.en: And then what?
He'll find Rose?
I don't know, but he will help us.
I just want to know what the fuck is happening. I want to know what the fuck is the plan.
translation.ja: 何が起きてて どうなるのか知りたいの

translation.en: I want to know that we can find my kid and then get in your fucking expensive car
translation.ja: 娘を見つけたら あなたたちの高級車に乗り⸺

translation.en: and drive to an actual hospital, find a doctor who will tell me that my baby is okay, that we're all gonna be okay,
translation.ja: 息子を病院に連れていき 私たちも医者に診てもらう

translation.en: and then we can just all go back to our house.
translation.ja: 家に帰れるか 聞くわ

translation.en: What if that's not possible?
I want to get the fuck away from here, and you, and whatever is happening.
translation.ja: 逃れたいの　ここや あなた 今起こってることから

translation.en: It's happening to all of us.
I know that it is happening to all of us!
Stop yelling at me!
You don't care.
You don't care that I'm here.
And my mom is probably at the bottom of some ocean.
translation.ja: ママが海の底に 沈んでることも

translation.en: I don't have anyone else in my life.
translation.ja: 私には両親しかいない

translation.en: I have nothing to go home to but them. Do you understand that?
translation.ja: 両親が死ねば 戻る場所がない　分かる？

translation.en: And I need my mom more than ever.
translation.ja: 今まで以上に ママが必要なのに

translation.en: And I will probably never see her again.
translation.ja: きっと二度と会えない

translation.en: I care, I do.
I don't know what I'm supposed to do about that, but I do care.
translation.ja: どうすべきか分からないけど

translation.en: Why are you like this?
What do you get out of being so angry all the time?
translation.ja: いつも怒ってて 何か得するの？

translation.en: Every day, all day, my job-- my whole job is to…
translation.ja: 毎日 朝から夜まで 私の仕事は⸺

translation.en: …understand people well enough so that I know how to lie to them,
translation.ja: 人をある程度理解して 嘘をつくこと

translation.en: so I can sell them things they don't really want.
translation.ja: 余計なものを 売りつけるためにね

translation.en: And when you study people like that,
translation.ja: そういうふうに 人を観察し

translation.en: when you really see the way they treat each other, well…
translation.ja: 人間関係を ずっと見てると…

translation.en: You're no dummy.
You see what they do, and they do it without even thinking about it.
translation.ja: 人が無意識に どう振る舞うか分かるでしょ

translation.en: Fuck. I did it to you and your dad, and I don't even really know why.
translation.ja: 私はあなたたちにも 同じ態度を取ってた

translation.en: We fuck each other over
all the time, without even realizing it.
translation.ja: いつの時でも 気付かぬままに

translation.en: We fuck every living thing on this planet over and think it'll be fine
translation.ja: 地球のすべての生物を ぞんざいに扱い⸺

translation.en: because we use paper straws and order the free range chicken.
translation.ja: 紙ストローと無農薬チキンで ごまかそうとする

translation.en: And the sick thing is, I think deep down we know we're not fooling anyone.
translation.ja: そんなの 何の役にも 立たないのを知ってるくせに

translation.en: I think we know we're living a lie.
translation.ja: わざと偽りの生活をする

translation.en: An agreed upon mass delusion
translation.ja: 合意の上で妄想を押し通す

translation.en: to help us ignore and keep ignoring how awful we really are.
translation.ja: 私たちがいかに酷いかを 認めたくないから

translation.en: I'm not down with most of the things that you do and say, but…
translation.ja: あなたの態度や言葉には 抵抗があるけど

translation.en: …this is the part of the Venn diagram where we overlap.
translation.ja: 私たちには共通点があるし

translation.en: I agree with everything you just said.
But as awful as people might be…
translation.ja: でも人がいくら酷くても…

translation.en: …nothing's gonna change the fact that we are all we've got.
I don't want to be this way.
I hate being terrible like this.
And I know I say I hate people, but I…
translation.ja: 人が大嫌いって言ったけど…

translation.en: I'd do anything to have them back.
translation.ja: 戻ってくるなら何でもする

translation.en: Hey, Dad.
Do you think Taylor's okay?
Who?
Archie, you stay here.
Let's go.
George.
Danny. Sorry to bother you at home like this.
translation.ja: ダニー　自宅に邪魔して悪い

translation.en: I'm gonna need you and your comrade to step off the porch and stand by your vehicle.
translation.ja: ２人ともポーチから下りて 車の脇に立て

translation.en: What?
Off the porch and by your vehicle.
translation.ja: ポーチから下り 車の脇に立て

translation.en: What can I do for you?
We're just checking on you.
Seeing if you're here, if you're okay.
translation.ja: ここにいるか 無事かとね

translation.en: If you heard anything about what's going on.
translation.ja: 何か情報を知っているか

translation.en: Yeah, I'm Clay.
My family rented G.H.'s-- George's home, you know.
translation.ja: 家族でＧ･Ｈ… ジョージの家を借りた

translation.en: We're from the city.
Well, that's a lucky break for your family.
translation.ja: そりゃ 幸運だったな

translation.en: Imagine what a shit show the city must be right now.
translation.ja: あっちはどえらいことに なってる

translation.en: I got to be honest with you, I'm surprised you guys are even out.
translation.ja: 正直言って 外出してるのに驚いた

translation.en: We came out here because my son needs help.
translation.ja: 息子に助けが必要なんだ

translation.en: He's vomiting. He's--
He's lost his teeth. They just fell out. Can't explain it.
translation.ja: 歯が抜け落ちた 理由は分からない

translation.en: Oh. His teeth, huh?
Well, it's gotta have something to do with that noise.
translation.ja: あの騒音のせいだろう

translation.en: You know something about the noise?
Well, it's not all that dissimilar to what happened in Cuba a while back.
translation.ja: 昔キューバで 起こったことと似てる

translation.en: Microwave weapons, they call it, produces a kind of radiation that can be beamed out through sound.
translation.ja: マイクロ波兵器といい 音を通してビームを発射する

translation.en: Some people lost their teeth there too.
translation.ja: その時も 歯をなくした人がいた

translation.en: Outside of that, the only thing I know for sure is
there's not a lot of information getting out, so…
translation.ja: あまり情報が 入ってこないが…

translation.en: I assume it's a war.
The beginning of one, anyways.
They've been saying there was chatter.
This has to be what they were chattering about.
Chatter, what do you mean, chatter?
You got to read the papers deeper than page one.
translation.ja: もっと新聞読まなきゃ

translation.en: The Russians recalled their staff from Washington.
translation.ja: ロシアは米国の首都から 幕僚を呼び戻した

translation.en: Did you even notice that?
Something is afoot. Now, what that is exactly, I don't know.
translation.ja: はっきりとは分からんが 何かが進行中だ

translation.en: Maybe this is as much as we're ever going to know. Maybe we just need to sit tight, be safe.
translation.ja: 他には何も知らされず じっとしてるしかないかもな

translation.en: Pray. Whatever works for you.
Well, Danny.
It's like Clay said, his son isn't well.
We're gonna need more than just prayers.
translation.ja: 祈るだけでは意味がない

translation.en: And knowing how primed you are for these kind of situations,
translation.ja: 君はいつも用意周到だ

translation.en: we're thinking you might have some medicine that'd be able to help him.
What I got isn't your business.
translation.ja: 俺の持ち物は あんたには関係ない

translation.en: Danny.
Come on now, it's me. We know each other.
translation.ja: 頼む　他人じゃないだろ

translation.en: We're friends.
That's the old way, George. You're not thinking clearly.
translation.ja: それは昔の話だ 今の状況を考えろ

translation.en: Danny, what are you saying?
You're telling this man not to take care of his son?
translation.ja: 息子を見殺しにしろと？

translation.en: Nothing makes a whole lot of sense right now. When the world doesn't make any sense, I can still do what's rational,
translation.ja: 不条理な世界でも 理に適(かな)うことはできる

translation.en: which is protect my own.
What you do is your business.
translation.ja: あんたのことは 俺には関係ない

translation.en: I thought I was doing the right thing by bringing them here.
translation.ja: ここに来るのが 適切だと思った

translation.en: Now if you have some medicine that can help him--
We can pay.
Say, a thousand dollars?
Cash might not mean much if the government falls.
translation.ja: 政府が倒れたら 金は価値を失う

translation.en: Well, the whole network's down. My credit cards aren't going to work.
translation.ja: ネットはダウンしていて カードは使えない

translation.en: There's no Venmo or ApplePay.
I mean, cash might be the only thing that means something.
translation.ja: 価値があるのは現金だけかも

translation.en: My son's really sick. He needs your help. He's 16 years old.
translation.ja: 息子を助けてくれ まだ16歳なんだ

translation.en: Nothing's here.
Rosie.
You're in a difficult position.
I get it.
I would do anything I had to for my family. So that's what I'm doing.
translation.ja: 俺も家族のためなら 今みたいに何でもする

translation.en: I'm locking the doors. I'm waiting, I'm watching,
translation.ja: 鍵を閉め ひたすら監視してる

translation.en: I'm getting out my gun.
Other than that, I don't have any answers for you.
translation.ja: それ以外に何の答えもない

translation.en: Ruth, it's bike tracks--
translation.ja: ルース 自転車の跡…

translation.en: I'm going to go back inside my house now.
I'm gonna say goodbye and good luck.
translation.ja: さようなら　幸運を祈る

translation.en: You come out again, you're welcome to stop by,
but I can't offer you much more than conversation.
translation.ja: 会話くらいしか できないけどな

translation.en: I suggest you try your neighbors, the Thornes.
translation.ja: 近所のソーンズの家に 行けばいい

translation.en: They did a basement conversion on the down- low a while back, no permits or nothing.
translation.ja: ずいぶん前 無許可で 地下を改築してる

translation.en: A buddy of mine worked on it. He wouldn't even show me the plans.
translation.ja: 友人が工事したが 図面は見てない

translation.en: Now, you ask me?
That's rich asshole talk for doomsday bunker.
translation.ja: 金持ち野郎の防空壕(ごう)だ

translation.en: Come on, Danny. You can't desert us like this.
translation.ja: 頼む　見捨てないでくれ

translation.en: Haven't you been picking up on what's going on out there, George?
translation.ja: この状況を 理解していないのか？

translation.en: We've all been deserted.
All due respect.
I would like all of you off of my property.
translation.ja: 俺の敷地から出ていってくれ

translation.en: Now.
We're not going anywhere till you give us what we need.
translation.ja: 薬をくれるまで ここを動かない

translation.en: What the fuck is going on right now?
I promised this boy's mother I'd get him some help.
translation.ja: 助けると母親に約束した

translation.en: The only thing you're helping him to is a quick death
translation.ja: 武器を下ろさないと 死んでしまうぞ

translation.en: - unless you lower your weapons. - G.H., put the gun down.
translation.ja: 武器を下ろさないと 死んでしまうぞ 銃を下ろして 他の道を探そう

translation.en: - We'll find another way to the hospital. - There is no other way!
translation.ja: 銃を下ろして 他の道を探そう 道なんかないし 彼には撃てない

translation.en: Besides, he's not gonna shoot us.
translation.ja: 道なんかないし 彼には撃てない

translation.en: Uh… It sounds like he's gonna shoot us.
- I'm telling you he's bluffing. - The fuck I am.
translation.ja: はったりだ 撃つぞ

translation.en: Hold-- Hold on! Hold on!
- Clay, get out of the way! - Dad!
I'm trying to reason with him!
The only way this ends
is if you get back in your vehicle and drive away now.
translation.ja: 車に乗って 今すぐ どっかに行け

translation.en: Drive away to what? All the roads are blocked.
translation.ja: どこに行けと？ 道は全部塞がってる

translation.en: We're in the middle of God- knows- where. There's no one else around.
translation.ja: 辺鄙(へんぴ)な所だし 人もいない

translation.en: I have no idea what I am supposed to do right now.
translation.ja: どうしていいか分からない

translation.en: I can barely do anything without my cell phone and my GPS.
translation.ja: 携帯やＧＰＳがないと 何もできない

translation.en: I am a useless man.
But my son is sick.
translation.ja: でも息子が病気なんだ

translation.en: And my daughter is missing.
translation.ja: 娘は行方が分からない

translation.en: And I don't know what to do.
But you are a very prepared man.
translation.ja: でもあなたは用意周到だ

translation.en: Fuck yeah, I am.
That's right, that's why we came to you, because you're the only one who can help my son.
translation.ja: だから来た あなたしか息子を救えない

translation.en: - Not my problem. - No, you're right. It's not.
translation.ja: 知るか そのとおりだ

translation.en: But it's like you said, right?
translation.ja: でもさっき言っただろ？

translation.en: What would you do if it was your family? That's what I'm doing.
translation.ja: 家族のためなら何でもすると 僕も同じだ

translation.en: It's the only thing I can do.
I am begging you.
Please.
Please help my son.
I guess an old fashioned barter system was to be expected at some point.
translation.ja: いずれ物々交換が 主流になるんだろう

translation.en: It's still cash, so it's not really a barter system.
Hey, I got another tidbit for you.
Free of charge, if you want it.
It's the Koreans behind all this.
translation.ja: これは北朝鮮の仕業だ

translation.en: Koreans?
What makes you say that?
Just trust me. It's the Koreans. Or the Chinese. One of them.
translation.ja: 信じろ　北朝鮮か中国 どっちかだ

translation.en: Show him.
I was driving around yesterday.
translation.ja: 昨日 運転してたら⸺

translation.en: There's a big drone dropping these everywhere.
translation.ja: ドローンが これをばらまいてた

translation.en: It means Death to America, so we're thinking Iranians.
translation.ja: “アメリカに死を” 僕たちはイランだと思う

translation.en: I remember hearing something on NPR once about their cyber capabilities.
translation.ja: サイバー攻撃が可能と ラジオで言ってた

translation.en: Why is that funny?
Before the phones went out,
translation.ja: 電話が通じなくなる前

translation.en: I heard from a friend of mine in San Diego about a similar event,
translation.ja: サンディエゴの友人から 同じような話を聞いた

translation.en: drones dropping pamphlets except they were in Korean.
translation.ja: ドローンがチラシをまいてた 朝鮮語のな

translation.en: Or Mandarin. Like I said, he couldn't tell which.
translation.ja: 中国語かも　友人には 区別がつかない

translation.en: But seeing as he did four tours in Iraq,
translation.ja: だが彼はイラクに ４回 行ったから⸺

translation.en: he sure as shit would have known if it looked like that.
translation.ja: この文字なら読めたはずだ

translation.en: We made a lot of enemies around the world.
translation.ja: 世界中に敵がいるからな

translation.en: Maybe all this means is a few of them teamed up.
translation.ja: チームを組んだのかも

translation.en: I saw flamingos in our pool last night.
translation.ja: 昨夜フラミンゴを見た

translation.en: The animals, they're trying to warn us.
translation.ja: 動物たちは警告してる

translation.en: They know something.
They know something that we don't.
translation.ja: 私たちが知らないことを

translation.en: It's like when dogs know storms are coming.
translation.ja: 犬が嵐を予告するように

translation.en: There's more bike tracks up ahead.
translation.ja: 自転車の跡が続いてる

translation.en: We should go back to the house. My dad is probably there.
translation.ja: もう帰ろう パパが戻ってるはず

translation.en: Maybe he can help… us.
translation.ja: 手伝ってくれる… かも

translation.en: I'm not going anywhere without Rosie.
That house. That's gotta be where she went.
translation.ja: 家よ あそこに行ったに違いない

translation.en: All right, let's go back and see if they found Rose.
translation.ja: よし 次はローズの捜索だ

translation.en: G.H., what's going on?
Before we go…
I need to know that you're on the level with me.
No matter how far this thing goes, I need to know that we're good
translation.ja: 何があろうと 安全を確保したい

translation.en: because if what just happened here is happening everywhere,
translation.ja: 他でも こういう状況なのなら

translation.en: we need to get to that bunker Danny told us about, and we need to get there now.
translation.ja: ダニーが言ってた 防空壕に避難すべきだ

translation.en: What are you talking about?
You know something.
I had a sneaking suspicion, but I wanted more information first.
translation.ja: 何となく予想していたが 確信したかった

translation.en: All signs were there, sure, but I…
I didn't want to scare anyone.
translation.ja: 怖がらせたくなかった

translation.en: You'd have called me crazy because it is crazy.
It would have made more sense if we were on the brink of an all- out invasion, but this…
translation.ja: 全面侵略なら理解しやすい だが これは…

translation.en: I didn't think we'd actually let something like this happen. I thought we were smarter than that.
translation.ja: こうなるのを許すほど 愚かだったとは…

translation.en: Let what happen?
Because my primary client works in the defense sector,
translation.ja: 僕の得意客は防衛関係だから

translation.en: I spend a lot of time studying the cost benefit analysis of military campaigns.
translation.ja: 軍事作戦の コスト分析を研究してきた

translation.en: There was one program in particular that terrified my client the most.
translation.ja: 彼はある作戦を 最も恐れていた

translation.en: A simple three- stage maneuver that could topple a country's government from within.
translation.ja: 政府を内部から転覆させる ３段階の簡単な作戦だ

translation.en: The first stage is isolation.
Disable their communication and transportation.
translation.ja: すべての通信と交通を 無効にする

translation.en: Make the target as deaf, dumb and paralyzed as possible,
translation.ja: 目標の国を可能な限り 無能にし マヒさせ

translation.en: setting them up for the second stage.
Synchronized chaos.
Terrorize them with covert attacks and misinformation,
translation.ja: 隠密作戦と誤報で 相手を恐怖に陥れ

translation.en: overwhelming their defense capabilities
leaving their weapon systems vulnerable to extremists and their own military.
translation.ja: 兵器システムを脆弱化(ぜいじゃくか)し 過激派や軍の侵入を許す

translation.en: Without a clear enemy or motive, people would start turning on each other.
translation.ja: 明らかな敵が見えないと 市民は互いを敵視する

translation.en: If done successfully, the third stage would happen on its own.
translation.ja: これが成功すると 第３段階は自然と起こる

translation.en: What's the third stage?
Coup d'état.
Civil war.
Collapse.
This program was considered the most cost- effective way to destabilize a country.
translation.ja: 国を揺るがすのに 最もコスパのいい作戦だ

translation.en: Because if the target nation was dysfunctional enough,
translation.ja: 目標の国家が 機能不全になれば⸺

translation.en: it would, in essence, do the work for you.
Whoever started this wants us to finish it.
translation.ja: 僕たちの手で国を破壊させる

translation.en: Rose!
